articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Teachers from Branch Schools
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Teachers from Branch Schools
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, met and had a photo session with teachers who volunteered to work at branch schools on islands and schools in forefront line and mountainous areas.
					 When respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un appeared at the venue of the photo session, the teachers enthusiastically welcomed him.
					
					 He spoke highly of pure patriotism displayed by the teachers with conscience and devotion as revolutionaries responsible for the future of the country, with the transparent faith and white gem-like loyalty with which they unsparingly devote themselves to settling the issues worried by the Party and to carrying out the work which is wished by the Party, whether they are known or not and appreciated or not, he said, calling on the whole society to put them forward and learn from their outlook on the revolutionary life and the future.
					
					 He had a photo session with the teachers. 
					
					 Present at the photo session were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, and leading officials of the WPK Central Committee and the education field.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Sympathy to President of Council of Ministers of Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Sympathy to President of Council of Ministers of Cuba
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, sent a message of sympathy to Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on September 12.
					 The message said:
					
					 Receiving the news of the causalities and losses of many materials caused by the recent hurricane in the eastern and central areas of your country, I extend deep consolation and sympathy to you and, through you, to the Cuban government, people and residents in the afflicted areas.
					
					 I believe that the Cuban party, government and people would eradicate the aftermath of the natural disaster and bring the living of the residents in the afflicted areas to normal as early as possible under your leadership.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Sunchon Cement Complex
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Sunchon Cement Complex
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju of the DPRK made a field survey of the Sunchon Cement Complex.
					 Going round various places of the complex, he encouraged the workers registering fresh successes in the cement production.
					
					 A consultative meeting was held on the spot to discuss measures to make the relevant units provide equipment and parts necessary for cement production and thus keep production going at a high rate.
					
					 Meanwhile, the premier inspected the site of the project for building the C1 chemical industry and discussed the measures to ensure the speed and quality of the project at the highest level and successfully establish overall production processes.

articles.title: Congratulations to Senegalese FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Senegalese FM
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho of the DPRK sent a congratulatory message to Sidiki Kaba on his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and Overseas Senegalese of Senegal on September 10.
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests, the message wished him success in his responsible work.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Land and Environment Protection led by Minister Kim Kyong Jun came back home on Tuesday after participating in the Asia-Pacific regional ministerial conference on environment and development held in Thailand.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on September 11.
					 The message said:
					
					 I was very thankful to receive kind message of greeting sent by you on my 52nd birthday.
					
					 I express thanks to you for expressing your sincere feelings giving great impression to me and our country and people.
					
					 The Syrian Arab Republic appreciates you for supporting our just cause and expressing belief that our army would win a final victory in the struggle for smashing the terrorist forces and defending the sovereignty and security of the country and territorial integrity in support of allies and friends.
					
					 Availing myself of this happy opportunity, I firmly believe that the special relations between our two countries would grow stronger in the joint struggle for defending the right of people to decide the sovereignty and independence of the country and their destiny in accordance with wellbeing of the two countries and peoples and the world.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Senegalese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Senegalese President
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Macky Sall, president of the Republic of Senegal, on September 1.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am pleased to extend the warmest greetings to Your Excellency on behalf of the government and people of Senegal and on my own behalf on the national day of your country.
					
					 Availing myself of this happy opportunity, I sincerely wish the Korean people well-being and your country bigger success in its development.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from DR Congolese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from DR Congolese President
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of the Democratic Republic of Congo, on September 5.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend the warmest greetings on behalf of all DR Congolese people and on my own behalf to you on the auspicious national day of your country.
					
					 Availing myself of this happy opportunity, I reaffirm my will to make positive efforts with you to further develop the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 I sincerely wish you good health and big success in your work for leading the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greetings from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on September 4.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un,
					
					 I extend the warmest greeting on behalf of all members of the WPM and on my own behalf to you on September 9, the 69th founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 The DPRK, founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by leader Kim Jong Il, has now turned into a strong socialist politico-military power honorably and courageously struggling against the imperialists' every aggression and provocation move under your wise guidance.
					
					 The Korean people's heroic struggle for the country's sovereignty and the dignity of the nation and peace of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world serves as a model of all the revolutionaries and the progressive peoples struggling for global independence.
					
					 I take this opportunity to heartily wish you good health and bigger success in your noble work, extending full support to the Korean people's struggle of justice.

articles.title: More Rallies Held to Hail ICBM-Ready H-bomb Test
articles.content:
More Rallies Held to Hail ICBM-Ready H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies took place in Sinpho and Huichon Cities and Kyongwon, Janggang, Tongrim, Yomju, Mundok, Kangryong, Paechon, Kumchon and Kilju Counties to hail the successful ICBM-ready H-bomb test.
					 Attending them were officials of local party and power organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms, universities and other units, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people of various circles, youth and students.
					
					 Speakers at the rallies stressed that the successful H-bomb test was ascribable to the energetic guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who has led the drive for bolstering up the nuclear force to develop Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea, the country of the great Sun, and into the strongest power.
					
					 They called for making a dynamic struggle for wining the final victory of revolution while demonstrating before the world the dignity and mettle of the Juche nuclear weapons state under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Taekwon-Do History Museum
articles.content:
Taekwon-Do History Museum
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- There is the Taekwon-Do history museum in the Taekwon-Do Holy House.
					 Paek Mi Yong, a lecturer of the museum, told KCNA:
					
					 The museum consists of three rooms. On display at the museum are data on the national martial arts proud of a 5,000-year-long history and tradition.
					
					 Room No. 1 shows the development of martial arts with Pyongyang as its center from the period of Tangun Korea to the Feudal Joson Dynasty on the basis of historical facts.
					
					 Data on Subakhui (a Korean style of martial art using only the hands) on the mural painting of the mausoleum of Kogukwon (A.D. 331-371), the king of Koguryo, and data on Taekwon-do patterns named after famous patriotic generals, help visitors know how the national martial arts were encouraged and given priority. 
					
					 Displayed at Room No. 2 are photos showing the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to adhere to and develop national martial arts, and cups and medals DPRK's Taekwon-do players bagged at international games.
					
					 There are Room No. 3 data on the organization and development of the International Taekwon-do Federation, and a world map showing the figures of countries and people learning Taekwon-do. 
					
					 The DPRK's Taekwon-do instructors and demonstration groups have trained Taekwon-do at over 90 countries and regions.
					
					 There are also portraits of famous Taekwon-do players in the hall of the museum.

articles.title: Dependence on Outside Forces Will Lead to Miserable Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Dependence on Outside Forces Will Lead to Miserable Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces discloses again their chronic evil practice of depending on outside forces while looking up to their master at a time when U.S.-led imperialists are feeling extreme uneasiness and terror owing to the great tremor caused by the DPRK's nuclear thunder, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Their criminal action goes to clearly prove once again their ugly colors as henchmen carrying out outside forces' policy for aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The reckless sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK kicked up by them, blindly dancing to the tune of the U.S., are an unpardonable treacherous act of going against the aspiration of the compatriots for national reconciliation and unity and the improvement of inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 It is illogical for the south Korean puppet authorities to talk about "dialogue" and "restoration of south-north relations" while desperately working to stifle the DPRK together with outside forces. 
					
					 They are going reckless in the van of the brigandish anti-DPRK sanctions of their U.S. master while crying out for the "harsh sanctions and pressure". This reminds one of traitors Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye who made desperate efforts to realize their daydream to stifle compatriots in the north in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 The catastrophe of north-south relations will be worse as long as the south Korean puppet forces are bent on the confrontation with the compatriots in collusion with outside forces,  
					
					 Sycophantic and treacherous acts and dependence on outside forces will lead to miserable destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Moves for THAAD Deployment Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Moves for THAAD Deployment Denounced
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Commentaries of leading newspapers here Tuesday denounce the south Korean authorities for pressing for the additional deployment of four THAAD launching pads on September 7 despite strong protest and denunciation by the public at home and abroad.
					 Rodong Sinmun says the wild acts of the south Korean authorities are tantamount to the crimes committed by traitor Park Geun Hye who was keen on sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 South Korea can not benefit from THAAD deployment, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 Instead, it will increase its international isolation, economic bankruptcy and insecurity.
					
					 However, the south Korean ruling forces are justifying their acts of submitting toward the U.S., talking about "inevitable option" to cope with "nuclear threat from the north".
					
					 This is a crafty trick to incite confrontation with the fellow countrymen and cover up their despicable sycophantic and traitorous nature.
					
					 It goes without saying that the racket for additional deployment of THAAD launchers is a product of U.S. pressure and the south Korean authorities' blind pursuance of it.
					
					 They are gravely mistaken if they think they can cover up the hideous acts of treachery with such clumsy rhetoric as an "inevitable option".
					
					 The south Korean authorities' THAAD deployment is as foolish an act as digging up their own graves.
					
					 Minju Joson demands the puppet forces not to run amuck, clearly understanding that their acts of escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen and opting for the invasion of the north in collusion with foreign forces would entail disaster beyond imagination.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Intention to Increase Warhead Weight
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Intention to Increase Warhead Weight
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces have become zealous in their moves to revise "missile guidelines" with the U.S. while citing the DPRK's measure for self-defence as a pretext.
					 Some time ago, the south Korean chief executive asked Trump to revise "missile guidelines" so that the weight of the puppet forces' ballistic missile warhead could be increased, and got a "verbal agreement" from him.
					
					 It is said that the issue will be discussed in real earnest in Seoul in coming October.
					
					 The puppet forces claim even though the range of the ballistic missiles was already extended so that the whole area of the DPRK could be put within their striking range through two revisions, the warhead weight is so small that the destructive power is limited. They call for increasing it to over 1 ton.
					
					 They are bluffing that the increase of the warhead weight to over 1 ton would be enough to "destroy the fortified commands and underground installations of the north with ease" and "get possessed of military deterrence capable of coping with the threats from the north".
					
					 It seems that the puppet forces totally lost the ability of the discerning the situation and the sense of direction, being upset by the eventful successes made by the DPRK in completing the nuclear force of the country and its continued tough offensive against the U.S.
					
					 Now ICBMs of the DPRK go across continent and oceans and fly into space and the detonation of super power thermonuclear weapon H-bomb is shaking the earth.
					
					 It is the might of our strategic weapons that they have been put on a high scientific and ultra-modern basis capable of making precision strikes at any enemies wherever they might be and from which direction they may come in attack.
					
					 It is ridiculous to try to find a way out in increasing the missile warhead weight by clinging to the master.
					
					 This will only bring into bolder relief the deplorable plight of the colonial stooge at the beck and call of the U.S., being unable to make its own decision over even such issue as the warhead weight.
					
					 Whenever the DPRK took measures for bolstering its nuclear force targeting the U.S., the south Korean puppet forces resorted to reckless military provocations raising louder hue and cry than others.
					
					 The U.S. used to bind the puppet forces in fetters of "missile guidelines" and never allowed them to move even an inch without its approval. But now it gave a "verbal agreement", revelation of an intention to use the stooges as cannon fodder for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen, launching a war of aggression and realizing its strategy for dominating Northeast Asia.
					
					 Disgusting indeed is the despicable acts of the puppet forces acting as if they have greatly benefited.
					
					 Nothing will change even though the warhead weight is increased.
					
					 Frankly speaking, the DPRK's nukes and strategic ballistic missiles are not just to counter the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 They should not go reckless.
					
					 We have already warned that if they make bluff for which they can not be responsible by counting on the U.S. master, that will cause disaster beyond imagination.

articles.title: S. Korea: Actions for THAAD Withdrawal Declared
articles.content:
S. Korea: Actions for THAAD Withdrawal Declared
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Six civic organizations of south Korea held a candlelight rally on Sept. 9 in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province, at which they denounced the puppet authorities for allowing the deployment of additional THAAD launching pads and declared a struggle for THAAD withdrawal.
					 The organizations in a statement slammed the "talk to people", published by the present chief executive after the additional THAAD deployment, as deception and mockery to the people.
					
					 They stressed that the THAAD withdrawal is the only true solution to the issue.

articles.title: S. Koreans Urge U.S. Military Pullout and Conclusion of Peace Accord
articles.content:
S. Koreans Urge U.S. Military Pullout and Conclusion of Peace Accord
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea reportedly held a rally in Seoul on Sept. 8 on the lapse of 72 years since the U.S. military occupation of south Korea.
					 In the rally they issued a resolution demanding the withdrawal of the U.S. troops and the conclusion of a peace pact.
					
					 The unity of the nation is the most powerful strength for realizing the conclusion of a peace accord and the independent reunification, the resolution said, calling for frustrating the U.S. ambition to dominate the Korean peninsula through a common struggle and ushering in a new era of independent reunification.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated by Chongryon
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated by Chongryon
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- There took place a reception for marking the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Sept. 8.
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), its department directors, chairpersons of its Kanto branch headquarters, leading officials of the organizations and enterprises under it and Korean businessmen.
					
					 Japanese personages in political, economic, media, social and cultural circles, members of foreign embassies in Japan, representatives of international bodies and correspondents of foreign media were invited to the event.
					
					 Chairman Ho Jong Man made a speech.
					
					 There witnessed in our homeland many successes in the drive for improving the people's standard of living and bolstering the nuclear deterrent for self-defence under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un this year that marks the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the chairman noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. has pursued policy hostile to the DPRK and attempted to mount a nuclear attack on it. This just pushed the DPRK to develop its nukes and rocket.
					
					 The present regime of south Korea which appeared thanks to the popular candlelight resistance is taking a two-faced stand as it asks the neighboring countries to impose harsher sanctions on the DPRK while talking about dialogue with it.
					
					 The Japanese regime should not add fuel to tensions by persisting in putting pressure on the DPRK but implement the Stockholm Agreement in the spirit of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration in order to tackle the issues pending solution between the two countries.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Treacherous Act Slammed by Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Treacherous Act Slammed by Koreans in U.S.
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on September 8 posted an editorial denouncing the south Korean puppet authorities' deployment of THAAD.
					 The editorial charged that the present ruling forces of south Korea cry out for "alliance" with the U.S. and "cooperation" with Japan, running contrary to the mindset of the candlelight holders and acting as a servant of the Trump administration.
					
					 It called on the south Koreans to guard against the outrageous acts of the U.S. ruling forces, seeing through the nature of imperialism which keeps the Korean nation bisected into the north and the south to draw water to its mill.

articles.title: 69th Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed in Peru
articles.content:
69th Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed in Peru
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting for celebrating the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK was held in Lima, Peru on September 5.
					 Present there were personages of political parties, organizations and organs and masses of Peru and the DPRK ambassador to Peru and members of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", said that the DPRK is demonstrating its dignity to the world as an independent power and invincible military power, envied by the world, thanks to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the most distinguished leaders.
					
					 He noted that the President was the greatest man, peerless politician and iron-willed brilliant commander as he founded the immortal Juche idea considering the popular masses as a driving force of history in the first period of his revolutionary struggle, led to victory the anti-Japanese armed struggle and the Fatherland Liberation War fought against the invasion of the U.S. imperialists, guided by the Juche idea, and built the DPRK as a genuine country of the people and socialist state of Juche.
					
					 He pointed out that the President worked heart and soul for national reunification in his lifetime.
					
					 He said that the President idea and cause were successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Today the DPRK is dynamically demonstrating the might as a nuclear power of Juche and ICBM state to the whole world under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, and the heroic Korean People's Army and people are filled with a do-or die resolution to win a final victory, he noted, adding:
					
					 No one on earth can match the strength of socialist Korea struggling, convinced of the victory of their cause, where the leader, party and masses are united in one mind.

articles.title: Nigerian Organizations Hail DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test
articles.content:
Nigerian Organizations Hail DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- Nigerian organizations released a joint statement on Sept. 3 congratulating the DPRK on its complete success in the test of H-bomb for ICBM.
					 They included the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, the Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and the Group for Self-Reliance Studies.
					
					 Extending warm congratulations to the Korean people who demonstrated the independent dignity and might of Juche-oriented nuclear power to the whole world once again with the successful test of H-bomb for ICBM, the statement went on:
					
					 The complete success in the test clearly showed that the Juche-based nukes of the DPRK have been put on a highly precise basis, the creditability of the operation of the nuclear warhead is fully guaranteed and the design and production technology of nuclear weapons have been put on a high level to adjust its destructive power in consideration of the targets and purposes. It also marked a very significant occasion in attaining the final goal of completing the state nuclear force.
					
					 We firmly believe that the Korean people would surely win a final victory in the confrontation with the imperialists and the U.S. under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people will more dynamically step up the building of a socialist power by dint of single-minded unity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Introduced in Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Introduced in Nepal
 Pyongyang, September 12 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese newspaper Arpan carried the brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il on September 1 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics and the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association also posted his brief biography on their websites on the same day.
					
					 Carried and posted on the newspaper and websites were portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se reune y se fotografia con los maestros voluntarios
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se reune y se fotografia con los maestros voluntarios
Pyongyang, 12 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se reunio con los maestros quienes solicitaron a trabajar voluntariamente en las escuelas halladas en islotes, la zona del frente avanzado y las regiones montanosas y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					Cuando el Maximo Dirigente salio al lugar de filmacion, los maestros voluntarios le dieron calurosa bienvenida.
					
					El dijo que esta muy emocionado por el patriotismo puro de ellos quienes dedican su conciencia y abnegacion sinceras como los maestros revolucionarios encargados del futuro de la patria llevandose la conviccion firme y la fidelidad verdadera de entregar todo lo suyo a los trabajos de solucionar los problemas preocupados y aspirados por el partido. Y agrego que toda la sociedad debe apreciarlos activamente y aprender su concepcion revolucionaria de la vida y la de generacion venidera.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente se fotografio junto a los maestros voluntarios.
					
					Estaban presentes tambien Choe Thae Bok, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y los funcionarios directivos del CC de PTC y de la rama de educacion.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon
Pyongyang, 12 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno las labores del Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon.
					Recorriendo varios lugares de la empresa, Pak estimulo a los obreros quienes logran nuevos exitos innovadores en la produccion.
					
					En la reunion consultiva efectuada en el terreno se tomaron las medidas para que las unidades relacionadas aseguren suficientemente los equipos y accesorios necesarios a la produccion de cemento a fin de normalizarla en alto nivel.
					
					Por otra parte, Pak estuvo en el lugar de obra para fundar la industria quimica de C1 mediante la gasificacion de carbon, donde delibero los problemas de medidas presentados en asegurar en el nivel supremo la velocidad y calidad de la construccion y acondicionar magnificamente los procesos productivos en general.

articles.title: Periodicos coreanos rechazan emplazamiento de THAAD en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Periodicos coreanos rechazan emplazamiento de THAAD en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 12 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Los periodicos centrales coreanos publicaron hoy los comentarios individuales denunciando a las autoridades surcoreanas que el pasado dia 7, emplazaron adicionalmente las 4 plataformas del sistema antimisiles THAAD, pese al fuerte rechazo y repudio de los nacionales y los extranjeros. 
					Rodong Sinmun lo califica de acto criminal igual a los crimenes cometidos por la traidora Park Geun-hye que se entregaba al servilismo pronorteamericano y al enfrentamiento fratricida, y continua:
					
					El despliegue del sistema antimisiles no da ningun provecho al Sur de Corea, sino incrementa el aislamiento exterior, la bancarrota economica y la crisis de seguridad.
					
					Sin embargo, los gobernantes surcoreanos justifican su actitud avasallante proyanqui con la sofisteria como "opcion inevitable" frente a la "amenaza nuclear del Norte de Corea". 
					
					Esto no pasa de ser una astucia para ocultar su naturaleza vendepatria. 
					
					Indudablemente, el alboroto de colocacion adicional de plataformas de THAAD es el resultado de la coercion de EE.UU. y de la obediencia ciega de las autoridades surcoreanas. 
					
					El despliegue de THAAD en el Sur de Corea es un acto suicida para las autoridades surcoreanas. 
					
					Minju Joson, a su vez, advierte a los titeres surcoreanos que actuen con prudencia teniendo presente que el enfrentamiento fratricida y la agresion a la parte connacional en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras produciran las calamidades inimaginables.

articles.title: ACNC burla del intento del Sur de Corea de aumentar el peso de ojiva
articles.content:
ACNC burla del intento del Sur de Corea de aumentar el peso de ojiva
Pyongyang, 12 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos se enfrascan en la enmienda de la "guia de misil" con EE.UU. cuestionando las medidas de autodefensa tomadas por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Segun trascendidos, el gobernante surcoreano rogo a Trump por la enmienda de la "guia de misil" para el aumento del peso de ojiva de misil balistico del ejercito surcoreano y consiguio su "consentimiento oral". Este tema se sometera a la plena discusion en Seul en octubre que viene. 
					
					Los titeres insisten en incrementar a mas de una tonelada el peso de ojiva pretextando que es restrictiva su destructividad, aunque a traves de la enmienda de dos veces del documento en cuestion, se ha alargado el alcance de tiro de misil balistico para alcanzar toda la extension norcoreana. 
					
					Fanfarronean que en este caso pueden "destruir facilmente la fortificada Direccion y las instalaciones subterraneas del Norte de Corea y disponer del disuasivo militar frente a la amenaza del Norte de Corea".
					
					Se parece que ellos ya perdieron el sano juicio de la situacion atemorizandose por los increibles exitos alcanzados en el perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado de la RPDC y su ofensiva superdura antiyanqui. 
					
					Ahora, estremecen a todo el mundo los cohetes balisticos intercontinentales y la bomba H de la RPDC. 
					
					Las sofisticadas armas nucleares estrategicas de la RPDC pueden acertar cualquier blanco que sea tan pequeno como una aguja y se halla en cualquier rincon de nuestro planeta.
					
					Es una absurdidad el intento de los titeres surcoreanos de buscar su salidero en aumentar el peso de ojiva con la ayuda de su amo norteamericano. 
					
					Se revela mas la situacion miserable de los lacayos coloniales que no pueden decidir a sus ganas ni siquiera el problema del peso de ojiva sin ganar el consentimiento de EE.UU. 
					
					Cada vez que la RPDC tomaba las medidas de fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares contra EE.UU., los titeres surcoreanos se desesperan mas que nadie e intensifican las imprudentes provocaciones militares.
					
					El "consentimiento oral" de EE.UU. parte del intento de utilizar a sus sirvientes surcoreanos como carne de canon del enfrentamiento fratricida, la guerra de agresion a la RPDC y el cumplimiento de la estrategia de dominio sobre el Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Es muy ridiculo el proceder de los titeres surcoreanos que no se dan cuenta del malsano intento de su amo norteamericano. 
					
					Ellos no pueden obtener nada con el aumento del peso de ojiva. 
					
					Francamente dicho, las armas nucleares y los cohetes balisticos estrategicos de la RPDC no son para atacar a los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben portarse bien. 
					
					Ya hemos advertido que su fanfarronada irresponsable basada en la confianza en su amo norteamericano traera las calamidades inimaginables.
